member_organisations: BureauLeiding has 5 Dutch plastic pipe manaufacturers as members. No organisations are members.
fields_of_interest: Consumers, Energy, Environment, Single market, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
* REACH, plus CLP 
* Waste Framework Directive 
* Construction Products Regulation, incl. CE 
* Drinking Water Contact 
* Sustainable (Public) Procurement 
* Product Environmental Footprint / Environmental Product Declarations 
* Circular Economy 
* Plastics Strategy
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
BureauLeiding is (in)direct member of:  
- Teppfa, the European Plastic Pipes & Fittings Association (http://www.teppfa.eu) 
- EuPC, the European Plastics converters (http://www.plasticsconverters.eu) 
- CPE, Construction Products Europe (http://www.construction-products.eu)
relevant_communication:
BureauLeiding does not organise such events. 
On an irregular basis newsletters are issued, more and more in a digital format. These are available via www.bureauleiding.nl (in Dutch only).
goals__remit:
De missie van BureauLeiding wordt als volgt omschreven: 
“De promotie van de hoge kwaliteit, de duurzame eigenschappen en het imago van kunststof leidingsystemen en de verbetering van de efficiënte toepassing van deze systemen. Dit ongeacht de toepassing, maar met een duidelijke focus op PVC.” 
 
BureauLeiding's mission is to promote the high quality, the sustainable characteristics and the image of plastic pipesystems, and to improve the efficient application of these systems, regardsless of the application, but with a focus on PVC.
